CustomField.description: SFS-62 , SFS-111 , SFS-1923 Updated for SFS-4793 Updated SFI-1783, added temporary check Updated as part of SFS-6987 Updated as part of SFS-8026
CustomField.formula: AND( NOT(ISNULL(FSM_Latitude__c )), NOT(ISNULL(FSM_Longitude__c )) , IF(ServiceTerritory.FSM_WorkingSubAreaRequired__c = True, NOT(ISNULL(FSM_Polygon__c )), true), FSM_HasImmediateTMA__c = false,FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_IsTemporaryRecord__c=false, FSM_StandardTextKey__c <> 'MHHVFTS',FSM_StandardTextKey__c <> 'MNHHVTS' )
CustomField.label: Ready For Schedule/Optimization
